thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: ChannelAdvisor Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.02

author: Reuters Editorial
title: ChannelAdvisor Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.02
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Channeladvisor Corp:
* CHANNELADVISOR ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.02 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 7 PERCENT TO $34.1 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE BETWEEN $29.4 MILLION AND $29.8 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $128 MILLION TO $130 MILLION * SEES ‍FULL YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA BETWEEN $6.0 MILLION AND $8.0 MILLION​
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $34.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $30.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
